img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(82\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/82/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2882%29.png)
Turn back on yourself, and now take the path down to the right. Clear the area of the Revenant Charbones, and head for the bottom of the stairs.
img_below_text:
On the left, you'll see a **Purple Lingzhi** and a path to take, but there's also one straight up ahead at the edge of the cliff.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(87\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c5/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2887%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a section of the "Woods of Ember" in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," highlighting a path that players should follow. The scene shows a rocky terrain with a prominent arrow pointing downwards, indicating the direction to proceed. The area is marked by sparse vegetation and a large tree, suggesting a desolate environment. The image serves as a visual guide for players to navigate the game, specifically directing them to clear the area of enemies and proceed down the stairs as part of the walkthrough.
